RADCURE-3962.Round 2-Turn 1-gap_recruit-recruiter:
1. Medical Oncologist - Your expertise is strictly limited to systemic therapy decisions, including chemotherapy and immunotherapy in head and neck cancers. - Hierarchy: Medical Oncologist == Radiation Oncologist  
2. ENT Surgeon - Your expertise is strictly limited to surgical evaluation and management of oropharyngeal squamous cell carcinoma, including assessment of resectability and functional outcomes. - Hierarchy: ENT Surgeon == Radiation Oncologist  
3. Radiologist - Your expertise is strictly limited to imaging interpretation for head and neck cancers, including staging and treatment response assessment using CT, MRI, and PET scans. - Hierarchy: Radiologist == Radiation Oncologist
